job.title: Social Media Manager
job.description: ltpgtemspace lovgren is growing its team were looking for aampnbspsocial media manager who is passionate about making a difference in the omaha metro and broader regionltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtmany of our clients are nonprofit organizations weve found a happy niche in this sector adding creative firepower to the missions of nonprofits and helping them make an even bigger impact in our community the person in this position will drive our clients digital media efforts and help us accomplish their online communications goalsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtjob descriptionltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgttheltstronggtltemgtampnbspsocial media managerltemgtltstronggtampnbspactively supports multiple communications initiatives including development of social strategies generating and growing social media plans implementing and reporting on their success and daytoday coordination and support of social initiativesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtthis growthoriented position can stretch to allow for the development and delivery of digital media services andor specific creative services such as content development copywriting editing new business efforts media relations and eventsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtqualificationsltstronggtltpgtltpgt minimum ba requiredltpgtltpgt years experience preferredltpgtltpgt strong social media backgroundltpgtltpgt agency experience is a plus for this position but its not requiredltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtadditional informationampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtwere committed to being a diverse and inclusive workplace that represents the community we serve and the clients we partner with learn more by reading the full job description on our website httpemspacegroupcomaboutcareersltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtplease send your resume and cover letter toltstronggtltpgtltpgtjames thompsonltpgtltpgtjamesemspacegroupcomltpgt
